title: Pokémon Center London cuts opening hours, limits purchases
text:
Now even harder to get into than before

You’ve now got even less chance of getting a London City Pikachu, as Westfield Shopping Centre outlaws tents and camping.

Thanks to ‘unprecedented demand’ the opening hours for Pokémon Center London have been cut from 10am to 10pm weekdays to 10am to 6pm (Sunday is still 12pm to 6pm).

That’s because even though queue times are currently between four and five hours, just to get in, they keep running out of stock, so they’re now limiting each customer to buying just six items from the shop (not including Switch hardware).

This is on top of the existing restriction that says you can only buy one London City Pikachu (the one with the bowler hat) item per person. So you can buy a cuddly Pikachu but not a pair of socks as well.

Remember: only six purchases per customer!

What are the Pokémon Center London store opening times?

Previously, shop staff have been stopping people queuing at around 2pm, so if everything is set back four hours that seems to mean queuing at all, once the store is open, is now being ruled out.

The store’s Twitter account isn’t explicit on that point but the best chance for getting in now is to camp overnight, or at least from the early hours of the morning.

Except, the Westfield London shopping centre, where the pop-up store is based, have said that you are not allowed to bring camping bags or tents. So if you really want to camp out you’ll have to do it outside (just like Pokémon Sword/Shield!).

‘We receive daily deliveries and endeavour to replenish stock as quickly as possible. However, due to unprecedented demand, some products may sell out before the end of the day’, says the Pokémon Center Twitter.

‘Our team are working hard to restock daily. However, as interest in the store has been unprecedented, some products may sell out before the shop’s closure on Friday 15th November.’

Important store info reminder: 📅 Friday, October 18 – Friday, November 15, 2019 ⏰ Monday to Saturday: 10am—6pm, Sunday: 12pm—6pm 📍 @WestfieldLondon If you're yet to visit #PokemonCenterLondon check out our answers to some frequently asked questions below ⬇️ — Pokémon Center London Updates (@PokemonPopUp) October 21, 2019
